text: Katie Boyle, Lady Saunders (born Caterina Irene Elena Maria Imperiali di Francavilla; 29 May 1926 â€“ 20 March 2018) was an Italian-born British actress, television personality, and game-show panelist. She was well known for appearing on TV panel games such as What's My Line? and for presenting the Eurovision Song Contest four times in the 1960s and 1970s. Boyle died on 20 March 2018 at her Manchester home at the age of 91. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Katie Boyle's appearance on This Is Your Life Category:1926 births Category:2018 deaths Category:British television presenters Category:British movie actors Category:British television personalities Category:Italian movie actors Category:People from Florence
title: Katie Boyle
